intro.description: This tutorial will help you with using the EDXD detector to scan various samples

item.title: Examine Scannable Objects
item.description:
Scroll the list of object categories until you find the Scannable objects.
Expand the list of scannable objects.

item.title: View Scannable Properties
item.description:
Select an item under the list of scannable objects.
Note the properties for this item will be displayed in the Properties view

item.title: Success
item.description:
Congratulations!
You have completed the GDA Quickstart tutorial .
